title: Add Phone Number
lede: Purchase and configure phone numbers for inbound and outbound calling.

sections.title: Acquiring Phone Numbers
sections.content:
Get phone numbers to enable calling functionality for your agents.

Number Types:

  • Local Numbers: Area-code specific numbers
  • Toll-Free: 800, 888, 877, etc.
  • International: Numbers from various countries

Setup Process:

  1. Browse available numbers
  2. Select desired area code or type
  3. Purchase and assign to agents
  4. Configure routing rules

images.caption: Phone number selection and configuration interface

metaTitle: Add Phone Number - Set Up Inbound/Outbound Calling | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Purchase and configure phone numbers for your AI agents. Set up local, toll-free, and international numbers.
